item.title: My Learning 'Odyssey': A Simple Example Shows How to Learn
item.description: Gladwell once proposed his famous 10,000-Hour Rule in his book, which means that ‘Genius is not a natural talent but a continuous effort, and it takes 10,000 hours at least to go from ordinary to extraordinary.’
